### [REINVENT - Realising Innovation something something](http://www.reinvent-project.eu)
This project specifically focused on industry decarbonisations and the quanitative representations that exist for the future of (basic) industries. The studies include data comparisons of IMAGE <http://www.pbl.nl>, WISEE <https://wupperinst.org/en/>, IEA, POLES-JRC, FORECAS, etc.
